abstract: The options dictionary that was used to create the shape.
overview:
## Discussion

You provide this dictionary in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(geometry:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(node:options:)] method. Use this dictionary along with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/sourceObject] property to recover the information that was used to create the shape.

If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(shapes:transforms:)] method, this property’s value is `nil`.

# options

**Instance Property**

The options dictionary that was used to create the shape.

## Declaration

```swift
var options: [SCNPhysicsShape.Option : Any]? { get }
```

## Discussion

You provide this dictionary in the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(geometry:options:)] or [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(node:options:)] method. Use this dictionary along with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/sourceObject] property to recover the information that was used to create the shape.

If the shape was created with the [doc://com.apple.scenekit/documentation/SceneKit/SCNPhysicsShape/init(shapes:transforms:)] method, this property’s value is `nil`.

## Getting Information About a Shape

- **sourceObject**: The object that was used to create the shape.
- **transforms**: The array of transforms that was used to create a compound shape.
